decoworld.model.world.entities.resourceNode

Class ResourceNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.StatEntity
        • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.CombatEntity
          • decoworld.model.world.entities.resourceNode.ResourceNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasSync, HasCollision, HasCombat, HasHealth, HasStats, StatListener, HasPhysicsBox, HasLevel, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem, java.lang.Iterable<StatType>

    public class ResourceNode
extends CombatEntity
implements HasCollision, HasPhysicsBox, HasLevel
    A node that when attacked drops item(s) and gives exp. Basis for other harvesting skill nodes.

            Id<WorldEntity> id,

        Generic constructor for a resource node.
        Parameters:
        worldId - the Id that of the World instance
        id - the Id of this entity in the world
        coordinate - the location of the node in the world
        rotation - the rotation of the node in the world

      • ResourceNode

        public ResourceNode(Id<World> worldId,
            Id<WorldEntity> id,
            Coordinate coordinate,
            double rotation,
            java.lang.String itemName,
            int expOnHarvest)
        Constructor for a resource node with the experience to be gained and the name of the item to be dropped.
        Parameters:
        worldId - the Id that of the World instance
        id - the Id of this entity in the world
        coordinate - the location of the node in the world
        rotation - the rotation of the node in the world
        itemName - the name of the item to be dropped from the node
        expOnHarvest - the amount of experience to be added to the skill
